item.title: CVE-2024-7206|2024-10-08T06:14:12.144Z -- ewelink -- zigbee%20bridge%20pro
item.description: SSL Pinning Bypass in eWeLink Some hardware products allows local ATTACKER to Decrypt TLS communication and Extract secrets to clone the device via Flash the modified firmware
